products.name: Organic Ragi Flour
products.subtitle: Finger Millet Flour - Calcium Rich
products.description: Premium organic ragi flour, packed with calcium and iron. Perfect for traditional South Indian recipes, porridges, and healthy baked goods. Known for its distinctive reddish-brown color and nutty flavor.
products.usage: Ideal for porridge, roti, dosa, idli, and baked goods
products.storage: Store in airtight container in cool, dry place

products.name: Premium Jowar Flour
products.subtitle: Sorghum Flour - Heart Healthy
products.description: Gluten-free jowar flour with a mild, sweet flavor. Rich in antioxidants and dietary fiber, making it perfect for rotis, bhakris, and modern baking recipes.
products.usage: Perfect for roti, bhakri, dosa, and baking

products.name: Traditional Bajra Flour
products.subtitle: Pearl Millet Flour - Energy Booster
products.description: Authentic pearl millet flour with earthy flavor and high iron content. Traditional staple in Rajasthani cuisine, perfect for winter meals and energy-boosting recipes.
products.usage: Best for roti, khichdi, and winter preparations

products.name: Foxtail Millet Grain
products.subtitle: Kangni - Diabetic Friendly
products.description: Whole foxtail millet grains with low glycemic index. Perfect for diabetics and weight management. Cooks quickly and has a mild, nutty flavor similar to rice.
products.usage: Use as rice substitute, make pulao, khichdi, or upma

products.name: Barnyard Millet Grain
products.subtitle: Sanwa - Protein Rich
products.description: Premium barnyard millet with highest protein content among millets. Small, white grains that cook quickly and are perfect for fasting foods and light meals.
products.usage: Ideal for fasting, khichdi, pulao, and light meals

products.name: Kodo Millet Grain
products.subtitle: Kodon - Fiber Superstar
products.description: Kodo millet with the highest fiber content among all millets. Excellent for digestive health and weight management. Traditional grain from Central India.
products.usage: Great for dosa, idli, upma, and rice dishes

products.name: Little Millet Grain
products.subtitle: Kutki - Mineral Rich
products.description: Tiny but mighty little millet packed with minerals like iron and zinc. Perfect for daily consumption and easy to digest. Cooks faster than most other millets.
products.usage: Perfect for daily rice substitute, pulao, and khichdi

products.name: Proso Millet Grain
products.subtitle: Chena - Antioxidant Rich
products.description: Proso millet with mild flavor and high antioxidant content. Versatile grain that works well in both sweet and savory dishes. Great for soups and salads.
products.usage: Excellent for soups, salads, porridge, and baking

products.name: Browntop Millet Grain
products.subtitle: Choti Kangni - Rare Premium
products.description: Rare browntop millet with unique nutritional profile. Grown in limited quantities, this premium millet offers excellent taste and health benefits for discerning customers.
products.usage: Special occasions, premium recipes, gourmet cooking

products.name: Amaranth Seeds
products.subtitle: Rajgira - Complete Protein
products.description: Premium amaranth seeds, a complete protein source with all essential amino acids. Perfect for fasting, gluten-free diets, and as a superfood addition to meals.
products.usage: Porridge, laddu, fasting recipes, protein boost
